perturbation.original_text:
Within ten (10) days of the Effective Date of this Agreement,
          e-centives shall make a non-refundable payment to Excite@Home of
          $***** as pre-payment for Payment-Eligible User Data records:
perturbation.changed_text:
Within one hundred eighty (180) days of the Effective Date of this Agreement,
          e-centives shall make a non-refundable payment to Excite@Home of
          $***** as pre-payment for Payment-Eligible User Data records:
perturbation.explanation: This change introduces an in-text contradiction by extending the payment deadline from 10 days to 180 days, which creates uncertainty in enforcement. The original text states a 10-day payment deadline, while the modified text extends it to 180 days, causing ambiguity over which deadline should be enforced, potentially leading to disputes.

perturbation.original_text:
Each Party will pay all earned and undisputed outstanding amounts owed
          to the other Party under this Agreement within thirty (30) days after
          the effective date of such termination. Notwithstanding the foregoing,
          all payments for User Data records shall be due and accrue in
          accordance with terms of this Agreement.
perturbation.changed_text:
Each Party will pay all earned and undisputed outstanding amounts owed
          to the other Party under this Agreement within ninety (90) days after
          the effective date of such termination. Notwithstanding the foregoing,
          all payments for User Data records shall be due and accrue immediately in
          accordance with terms of this Agreement.
perturbation.explanation: This change introduces an in-text contradiction by extending the payment deadline from 30 days to 90 days, and changing accrual to immediately after termination. The original text states a 30-day payment deadline, while the modified text extends it to 90 days, and changes when User Data payments accrue, causing ambiguity over which deadlines and accrual to be enforced, potentially leading to disputes.

perturbation.original_text:
Application Provider shall remove any such advertising within twenty-four (24) hours of
          receipt of any such written request.
perturbation.changed_text:
Application Provider shall remove any such advertising within seventy-two (72) hours of
          receipt of any such written request.
perturbation.explanation: This change introduces an in-text contradiction by extending the ad removal deadline from 24 hours to 72 hours, which creates uncertainty in enforcement. The original text states a 24-hour deadline, while the modified text extends it to 72 hours, causing ambiguity over which deadline should be enforced, potentially leading to disputes.
